mapper.select: select reviewno, subject, content, userid, roomno, rating, date_format(writedate, '%Y-%m-%d') writedate from review where reviewno=#{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into review (userid, roomno, rating, subject, content) values (#{userid}, #{roomno}, #{rating}, #{subject}, #{content})
mapper.select: select reviewno from review where userid=#{param1} order by reviewno desc limit 1
mapper.update: update review set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, rating=${rating} where reviewno=${reviewno}
mapper.select:
select count(reviewno) cnt from review
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'
where subject like '%${searchWord}%' or content like '%${searchWord}%' or roomno like '%${searchWord}%'
